name: HellShade
description:
Warning: There are flashing lights, loud sounds and large-ish pools of blood, by playing this game you are 

hereby argreeing that you are cool with this and are an epic person, cool?

Made for the Themed Horror Game Jam #12

You wake up at midnight in your hotel room, the guests and your parents are gone, the only resident is a

murderous intruder out for blood. Stay from the light, survive his trickery, and escape 

the onslaught of the infamous killer, the HellShade.

Art and Sounds:
